events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your details shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the software developer track.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your candidacy for better support during the process.
Your initial screening was successfully completed. The recruiter noted strong experience in relevant software development technologies.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview next week.
Your technical interview is scheduled for 2024-05-20 at 14:00 UTC. Please prepare for coding and system design questions.
The technical interview was completed successfully. The panel was impressed with your problem-solving skills and technical knowledge.
We have scheduled your HR interview for 2024-05-23 at 11:00 UTC to discuss your cultural fit and benefits.
Your HR interview went well. The team appreciated your communication skills and alignment with company values.
We have sent you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position including all compensation and benefits details.
You provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer for the Software Engineer role, and we look forward to welcoming you onboard.
Your onboarding process has started. Please complete the necessary forms and review our engineering team guidelines.
The hiring process for your position is now closed successfully. Welcome again to our engineering department!
